ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But when the great calamity comes
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: But when the deafening cry shall be sounded
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So when the deafening Shout arrives,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: But when the deafening cry comes,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And when the Blast shall sound,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But when the deafening blast is sounded,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then when cometh the Deafening Cry-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So when the deafening Cry comes—
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: At length, when there comes the Deafening Noise,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then, when there comes As-Sakhkhah (the Day of Resurrection's second blowing of Trumpet),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But when the Deafening Noise comes to pass.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But when there comes the Deafening Blast
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [80:33] So when the [deafening] Cry, the second blast, comes —
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (But when the Shout cometh) when the Hour comes, all created beings will scream and then submit and answer the call. Created being will be abased and know then that its advent is true.
